mapper.select: SELECT a.I_RESER, a.i_host, a.i_user, a.check_in AS chin, a.check_out AS chout, a.GEST_QTY AS qty, a.total_FEE, b.ROOM_TITLE, b.ADDR, c.CHECKIN_T, c.FINICH_T, d.IMG_URL, a.reser_state FROM user_reser a INNER JOIN host_user b ON a.i_host = b.i_host INNER JOIN check_inout c ON a.I_HOST = c.I_HOST INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM rooms_img GROUP BY i_host ) d ON a.i_host = d.i_host WHERE a.i_user = #{i_user} AND a.check_out >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') or a.reser_state in('cc','ch') ORDER BY a.R_DT asc
